data.title: Focused Collections: Public, Schools, & Government Libraries
data.meta_description: ProQuest offers Public, Schools, & Government Libraries a number of carefully curated subscriptions that simplify acquisition.
data.text:
Quality over Quantity Content Designed to Drive Usage—and Usability

ProQuest offers libraries a number of carefully curated subscriptions to serve researchers of all types. All of our subscriptions offer unlimited, multi-user access and continued growth and are delivered on the Ebook Central platform built for research.

Many libraries utilize subscription as an affordable base of foundational content tied to patron outcomes, and over time they leverage usage and user behavior statistics to inform their acquisition decisions. ProQuest subscriptions are designed to work better together with our other flexible purchase models, such as Demand-Driven Acquisition, Short-term Loans, Access to Own, and Perpetual Archive—to meet both budget and patron demand.
